Name: Bubble Gun 3D
About the game: Bubble Gun 3D is the most unique, addicting and satisfying shooting game so far! Progress through a multitude of challenging and unique levels, shooting bubbles to knock the enemies off their platforms. Bubble Gun 3D has simple and intuitive controls, simply aim and shoot bubbles with the mouse or gamepad. Knock all the enemies off their platforms and progress to the goal of each level to progress. Collect gems to unlock new bubble guns and choose your own custom colours. Once you have completed all the levels, New Game Plus can be unlocked for an even greater challenge!
